descp2: boolean or 'allow-nan', (default=True) Whether to raise an error on np.inf and np.nan in array. The possibilities are: - True: Force all values of array to be finite. - False: accept both np.inf and np.nan in array. - 'allow-nan': accept only np.nan values in array. Values cannot be infinite. For object dtyped data, only np.nan is checked and not np.inf.
